disclaimerData.disclaimer:
PATIENT AGREEMENT: This form provides information about skin tightening treatments following fat reduction procedures like liposuction or non-invasive fat loss. Read thoroughly and discuss with your practitioner before proceeding.

Take time to consider all options, seek second opinions, and ask questions. Post-fat reduction skin tightening uses radiofrequency (RF), ultrasound, infrared laser (SkinTyte), or fractional lasers to heat dermal layers, stimulating neocollagenesis and elastin remodeling for improved skin contraction. Non-invasive sessions last 30-60 minutes; typically 4-8 treatments spaced 1-2 weeks apart. Results gradual over 3-6 months; enhances natural skin retraction after volume loss.

Avoid sun exposure 2 weeks pre/post (SPF 50+), maintain hydration, gentle skincare. Multiple sessions required; informed of practitioner each time, withdraw consent anytime.

RISKS AND POSSIBLE REACTIONS: Common: temporary redness, warmth, mild swelling (resolves 24-48 hours). Less common: blistering, crusting, hyperpigmentation (darker skin higher risk).

Rare: burns, scarring, fat atrophy, suboptimal tightening. Contraindications: active infections, recent fillers (wait 4 weeks), pregnancy, pacemakers (RF/ultrasound), photosensitive medications.

I confirm understanding of procedure reasons, risks (including not treating), personal health risks, benefits, alternatives (surgical lift, compression garments), uncertainties, follow-up care.

MEDICAL IMAGERY: I authorize clinical photos/videos for confidential records.

I certify reading/understanding this form, questions answered satisfactorily, and consent to procedure.

questions.content: Do you comprehend the details that have been given to you?
Do you believe enough information has been shared to allow you to give informed consent?
Have you given your consent voluntarily?
Are there any health issues you currently have?
Are you currently pregnant or nursing a child?
Do you suffer from a neuromuscular disorder (such as Multiple Sclerosis, ALS, motor neuropathy, myasthenia gravis, or Lambert-Eaton syndrome)?
Do you have an autoimmune condition?
Do you experience any skin problems?
Do you have any known allergies or a history of severe allergic reactions (anaphylaxis)?
Is there an active infection at the area where the procedure is planned?
Are you currently on any antibiotics or other prescribed medications?
Is there any other Medical or Social History we should be aware of? If yes, please explain in detail.
What are your goals and desired results for undergoing this procedure? Please elaborate.
Have you undergone this or a comparable treatment previously? If so, were there any issues? Please provide details.
Do you have any concerns? If so, please describe them.
Is there anything else we need to know? Please provide full information.
I will keep this information for the duration of my treatment and consult it as needed.
